tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository for TypoSentinel with the necessary structure and configuration files.
tasks.details: Create a Git repository and set up the initial directory structure. Include README.md, .gitignore, and basic configuration files (e.g., package.json for Node.js).
tasks.testStrategy: Verify repository initialization by cloning it and checking for the presence of required files.

tasks.title: Implement NPM Package Parsing
tasks.description: Develop the core functionality for parsing package.json files to extract package metadata and dependencies.
tasks.details: Use a JSON parser to read package.json files and extract fields such as name, version, and dependencies. Implement error handling for invalid JSON structures.
tasks.testStrategy: Create unit tests to validate parsing of various package.json structures, including edge cases.

tasks.title: Implement Package Lock File Parsing
tasks.description: Add support for parsing package-lock.json, yarn.lock, and pnpm-lock.yaml files to enhance dependency resolution.
tasks.details: Develop separate parsers for each lock file format. Ensure that dependencies and their versions are accurately extracted and represented in the dependency tree.
tasks.testStrategy: Write integration tests to ensure that all lock file formats are parsed correctly and that dependencies are resolved as expected.

tasks.title: Enhance Dependency Resolution
tasks.description: Implement advanced dependency resolution logic to detect version conflicts and ensure accurate dependency trees.
tasks.details: Create algorithms to analyze the dependency tree and identify conflicts. Use a graph-based approach to represent dependencies and their relationships.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct tests with various dependency scenarios to ensure that conflicts are detected and reported accurately.

tasks.title: Integrate NPM Registry API
tasks.description: Implement real-time integration with the NPM registry API to fetch package metadata and download statistics.
tasks.details: Use Axios or Fetch API to make requests to the NPM registry. Handle API responses and errors appropriately, caching results where necessary.
tasks.testStrategy: Test API integration by fetching metadata for known packages and verifying the accuracy of the returned data.

tasks.title: Setup SQLite Threat Database
tasks.description: Design and implement the SQLite database schema for storing known malicious packages and threat patterns.
tasks.details: Define the database schema with tables for threat records, including fields for type, severity, confidence, and recommendations. Use SQLite for local storage.
tasks.testStrategy: Run schema migration scripts and verify the database structure using SQLite tools.

tasks.title: Implement Threat Update Mechanism
tasks.description: Create a mechanism to update the SQLite threat database with new known malicious packages.
tasks.details: Develop a script that fetches updates from external threat intelligence sources and updates the SQLite database accordingly.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the update mechanism by simulating updates and verifying that the database reflects the changes.

tasks.title: Enhance Typosquatting Detection
tasks.description: Improve the typosquatting detection algorithms using keyboard layout analysis and character substitution patterns.
tasks.details: Implement algorithms that analyze package names for similarity based on keyboard layouts and common character substitutions.
tasks.testStrategy: Create test cases with known typosquatting examples to validate the effectiveness of the detection algorithms.

tasks.title: Implement Basic ML Scoring Algorithm
tasks.description: Develop and test a basic machine learning scoring algorithm for detecting malicious packages based on comprehensive features extracted from the package metadata.
tasks.details: The BasicMLScorer implementation is complete, using logistic regression with weighted features including download counts, maintainer reputation, package age, typosquatting similarity, and metadata indicators. The system performs feature extraction, normalization, scoring, confidence calculation, and risk level determination.
tasks.testStrategy: Evaluate the implemented BasicMLScorer using a labeled dataset, measuring performance metrics including accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score. Validate the confidence calculation and risk level determination logic.

subtasks.title: BasicMLScorer implementation
subtasks.description: Logistic regression model with feature extraction, normalization, scoring, confidence calculation, and risk level determination

subtasks.title: Test BasicMLScorer implementation
subtasks.description: Evaluate model performance and validate confidence/risk level calculations

tasks.title: Create Comprehensive Test Datasets
tasks.description: Developed comprehensive test datasets for ML analysis validation across multiple package managers.
tasks.details: Created and validated test datasets covering NPM, PyPI, and Go modules with legitimate and suspicious packages featuring various risk factors and attack patterns. Implemented validation framework and test infrastructure.
tasks.testStrategy: Validation includes accuracy metrics (precision, recall, F1-score), performance benchmarks, confusion matrix analysis, and risk factor detection validation through comprehensive test suite.

subtasks.description: Created NPM test packages (3 legitimate + 5 suspicious)
Created PyPI test packages (3 legitimate + 5 suspicious)
Created Go modules test packages (4 legitimate + 4 suspicious)
Developed test_config.json with expected results and benchmarks
Created ml_validation_test.go test suite with performance benchmarks

tasks.title: Implement Integration Tests
tasks.description: Integration test infrastructure has been successfully implemented, covering the complete analysis pipeline from parsing to threat detection.
tasks.details:
Comprehensive test suite includes:
- Full pipeline integration tests
- End-to-end scenarios
- Performance benchmarks
- Unified test orchestration

All components are now in place and ready for execution with extensive coverage.
tasks.testStrategy:
Execute the complete test suite including:
- Integration tests (tests/integration_test.go)
- End-to-end tests (tests/e2e_test.go)
- Performance benchmarks (tests/benchmark_test.go)

Validate all components work together as expected with comprehensive reporting capabilities.

subtasks.title: Implement core integration tests
subtasks.description: Created integration_test.go with full pipeline testing capabilities

subtasks.title: Develop end-to-end test scenarios
subtasks.description: Implemented e2e_test.go with real-world scanning scenarios

subtasks.title: Build test orchestration system
subtasks.description: Implemented test_runner.go with unified execution and reporting

tasks.title: Add Performance Benchmarks
tasks.description: Implement performance benchmarks to measure the efficiency of the analysis engine and identify bottlenecks.
tasks.details: Use profiling tools to measure execution time and resource usage during analysis. Document the results for future optimization.
tasks.testStrategy: Run benchmarks under various load conditions and analyze the results to identify areas for improvement.

tasks.title: Improve CLI Output Formatting
tasks.description: Enhance the CLI output formatting to include color coding and severity indicators for better user experience.
tasks.details: Use libraries like chalk to format CLI output. Implement severity levels that visually distinguish between different threat levels.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the CLI output with various threat scenarios to ensure that formatting is applied correctly.

tasks.title: Add Configuration File Support
tasks.description: Implement support for configuration files in YAML/JSON format to allow users to customize scanning options.
tasks.details: Develop a parser for configuration files and integrate it into the CLI tool to read user-defined settings.
tasks.testStrategy: Create tests to validate that configuration options are correctly applied during scanning.

tasks.title: Implement Caching for Faster Scans
tasks.description: Add caching mechanisms to speed up subsequent scans by storing results of previous analyses.
tasks.details: Use Redis or in-memory caching to store results of previous scans and avoid redundant processing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the caching mechanism by running multiple scans and verifying that cached results are used appropriately.

tasks.title: Add Verbose Logging and Debug Modes
tasks.description: Implement verbose logging and debug modes in the CLI tool to assist in troubleshooting and analysis.
tasks.details: Use a logging library to implement different logging levels and output logs to console and files as needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Test logging functionality by running the CLI in different modes and checking log outputs for accuracy.

tasks.title: Complete Python Package Analyzer
tasks.description: Develop the Python package analyzer to support pip, pipenv, and poetry, including requirements.txt and Pipfile parsing.
tasks.details: Implement parsers for Python package formats and integrate them into the existing analysis framework.
tasks.testStrategy: Create tests to validate the parsing of Python package files and ensure accurate dependency resolution.

tasks.title: Enhance Go Modules Support
tasks.description: Add support for enhanced analysis of Go modules, including go.mod and go.sum parsing and proxy integration.
tasks.details: Develop parsers for Go module files and implement logic for proxy integration to fetch package metadata.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the Go module analyzer with various scenarios to ensure accurate parsing and dependency resolution.

tasks.title: Implement Ruby Gems Support
tasks.description: Add support for Ruby Gems, including Bundler integration and parsing of Gemfile and Gemfile.lock.
tasks.details: Develop parsers for Ruby package files and integrate them into the analysis framework.
tasks.testStrategy: Create tests to validate the parsing of Ruby package files and ensure accurate dependency resolution.

tasks.title: Design Language Plugin Interface
tasks.description: Design and implement a pluggable architecture for adding new language support to the TypoSentinel framework.
tasks.details: Define an interface for language analyzers and implement a registration mechanism for new plugins.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the plugin architecture by creating a sample language analyzer and verifying its integration.

tasks.title: Implement Machine Learning Pipeline
tasks.description: Develop a machine learning pipeline for feature extraction and model inference for threat scoring.
tasks.details: Implement data preprocessing, feature extraction, and model inference steps in the ML pipeline.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the ML pipeline with sample data and validate the accuracy of the threat scoring.

tasks.title: Integrate External Threat Feeds
tasks.description: Implement integration with external threat intelligence feeds to enhance real-time threat detection capabilities.
tasks.details: Use APIs from threat intelligence providers to fetch real-time data and integrate it into the analysis engine.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the integration by simulating threat feed updates and verifying that the analysis engine responds appropriately.

tasks.title: Build REST API
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive REST API for programmatic access to TypoSentinel features, including authentication and rate limiting.
tasks.details: Use Express.js to build the API endpoints and implement JWT authentication for secure access.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the API endpoints with various requests and validate authentication and rate limiting functionality.

tasks.title: Create Web Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop a React-based web dashboard for visual threat analysis and reporting.
tasks.details: Use React and a state management library (e.g., Redux) to build the dashboard interface and connect it to the REST API.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the dashboard functionality by simulating user interactions and verifying that data is displayed correctly.

tasks.title: Implement User Management and Access Controls
tasks.description: Add user management features to the web dashboard, including role-based access control and user authentication.
tasks.details: Implement user registration, login, and role management features in the web application.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user management features by creating, updating, and deleting users and verifying access controls.

tasks.title: Set Up Production Database
tasks.description: Configure PostgreSQL as the production database for TypoSentinel, including schema migration and data retention policies.
tasks.details: Set up PostgreSQL database and implement migration scripts to create necessary tables and relationships.
tasks.testStrategy: Test database setup by running migration scripts and verifying the database structure.

tasks.title: Implement Redis Caching Layer
tasks.description: Add Redis caching to improve performance and reduce load on the PostgreSQL database.
tasks.details: Integrate Redis into the application for caching frequently accessed data and implement caching strategies.
tasks.testStrategy: Test caching functionality by measuring response times with and without caching.

tasks.title: Add CI/CD Integration
tasks.description: Develop plugins for CI/CD platforms (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins) to automate scanning in build pipelines.
tasks.details: Create plugins that integrate TypoSentinel scanning into popular CI/CD workflows and provide configuration options.
tasks.testStrategy: Test CI/CD plugins by running builds with TypoSentinel scans and verifying that results are reported correctly.

tasks.title: Implement SAML/SSO Integration
tasks.description: Add support for SAML/SSO authentication to enhance security for enterprise users.
tasks.details: Implement SAML authentication flow and integrate it into the web application for user login.
tasks.testStrategy: Test SAML/SSO integration by simulating user logins and verifying access to the dashboard.

tasks.title: Create Compliance Reporting Features
tasks.description: Develop features for compliance reporting (SOX, PCI-DSS) to meet enterprise requirements.
tasks.details: Implement reporting features that generate compliance reports based on scanning results and user activity.
tasks.testStrategy: Test compliance reporting by generating reports and verifying their accuracy against known standards.

tasks.title: Conduct Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Perform performance optimization and profiling to ensure the application can handle high-volume scanning.
tasks.details: Analyze application performance and identify bottlenecks. Implement optimizations as needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Run performance tests under load and measure response times and resource usage.

tasks.title: Implement Security Hardening
tasks.description: Conduct security hardening and penetration testing to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities in the application.
tasks.details: Perform security assessments and implement best practices for securing the application and its components.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct penetration tests and review security reports to ensure vulnerabilities are addressed.

tasks.title: Set Up Load Balancing and High Availability
tasks.description: Implement load balancing and high availability strategies to ensure the application can scale effectively.
tasks.details: Configure load balancers and set up redundancy for critical components to ensure uptime and reliability.
tasks.testStrategy: Test load balancing by simulating traffic and verifying that requests are distributed evenly.

tasks.title: Create Strategic Implementation Plan for TypoSentinel
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive strategic implementation plan to transition TypoSentinel from MVP to a production-ready enterprise security tool.
tasks.details: This task involves defining the overall development strategy, prioritization framework, resource allocation, and execution roadmap for TypoSentinel. Key components include: 1. Milestone Definitions: Establish clear milestones for each phase of development, including timelines and deliverables. 2. Success Criteria: Define measurable success criteria for each milestone to assess progress and quality. 3. Risk Mitigation Strategies: Identify potential risks in the development process and propose mitigation strategies to address them. 4. Coordination Guidelines: Outline communication and collaboration protocols for the development team to ensure alignment and efficiency. 5. Resource Allocation: Assess and allocate necessary resources, including personnel, tools, and budget, to support the development efforts effectively.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the implementation plan by reviewing the defined milestones, success criteria, and risk mitigation strategies with stakeholders. Conduct a walkthrough of the plan with the development team to ensure understanding and alignment. Monitor the initial phases of implementation to ensure adherence to the plan and adjust as necessary based on feedback and performance metrics.
